title: Exposed Documentation
subtitle: Exposed is a Kotlin SQL database library with two flavors: a lightweight ORM (using DAO) and type-safe SQL (using DSL).

tips.title: Getting Started with Exposed
tips.description: Start exploring Exposed step-by-step by building our sample project from scratch

data.title: Adding Dependencies
data.description: Learn how to configure Exposed in the existing project using Gradle or Maven build systems

data.title: Tables and Columns ABC
data.description: Start creating your first tables and get familiar with the column types

data.title: Querying Database
data.description: Learn how to write database queries using Exposed query DSL

data.title: Introduction to ORM Entities
data.description: Learn how to perform basic CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations using entities mapping

data.title: Contributing to Exposed
data.description: Learn how to contribute to Exposed

data.title: Migration Guide
data.description: Check how to update to the latest Exposed version
